entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Bay Roberts
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Monday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of rain or drizzle changing to snow this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 10 cm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 near midnight then northeast 30 gusting to 50. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas early in the morning. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow and blowing snow beginning before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening and minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries. High minus 3. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Monday 06 February 2023
